00019 #ifndef SP_MULTI_TEXTURED_QUAD_H
00020 #define SP_MULTI_TEXTURED_QUAD_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamGeometry.h"
00024 
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 
00028 namespace Spark
00029 {
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 class SpMultiTexturedQuadSg : public SpStreamGeometry
00035 {
00036 
00038 public:
00039 
00040     inline SpMultiTexturedQuadSg(
00041         float fMinX = 0.0f, float fMinY = 0.0f,
00042         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.5f,
00043         float fMinS = 0.0f, float fMinT = 0.0f,
00044         float fMaxS = 1.0f, float fMaxT = 1.0f)
00045     :
00046         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00047         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ)
00048     {
00049         glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_UNITS, &m_iTextureUnitCount);
00050 
00051         m_afMinS = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00052         m_afMaxS = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00053         m_afMinT = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00054         m_afMaxT = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00055 
00056         setTexCoordRect(fMinS, fMinT, fMaxS, fMaxT);
00057     }
00058 
00059     inline virtual ~SpMultiTexturedQuadSg()
00060     {
00061         delete [] m_afMinS;
00062         delete [] m_afMaxS;
00063         delete [] m_afMinT;
00064         delete [] m_afMaxT;
00065     }
00066 
00068 public:
00069 
00070     virtual void render()
00071     {
00072         glNormal3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, 1.0f);
00073         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00074         {
00075             int i;
00076 
00077             // Lower Left
00078             for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00079                 glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, m_afMinS[i], m_afMinT[i]);
00080             glVertex3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00081 
00082             // Lower Right
00083             for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00084                 glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, m_afMaxS[i], m_afMinT[i]);
00085             glVertex3f(m_fMaxX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00086 
00087             // Upper Right
00088             for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00089                 glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, m_afMaxS[i], m_afMaxT[i]);
00090             glVertex3f(m_fMaxX,  m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00091 
00092             // Upper Left
00093             for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00094                 glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, m_afMinS[i], m_afMaxT[i]);
00095             glVertex3f(m_fMinX,  m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00096 
00097         }
00098         glEnd();
00099 
00100     }
00101 
00102     inline void setTexCoordRect(
00103         float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00104     {
00105         for (int i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00106         {
00107             setSingleTexCoordRect(i, fMinS, fMinT, fMaxS, fMaxT);
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00112         float fMinX, float fMinY, float fMaxX, float fMaxY, float fZ=0.5f)
00113     {
00114         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00115         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00116         m_fZ = fZ;
00117     }
00118 
00119 
00121 protected:
00122 
00123     inline void setSingleTexCoordRect(
00124         int iTexUnit, float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00125     {
00126         m_afMinS[iTexUnit] = fMinS; m_afMaxS[iTexUnit] = fMaxS;
00127         m_afMinT[iTexUnit] = fMinT; m_afMaxT[iTexUnit] = fMaxT;
00128     }
00129 
00130 
00132 protected:
00133 
00134     int m_iTextureUnitCount;
00135 
00136     float m_fMinX;
00137     float m_fMinY;
00138     float m_fMaxX;
00139     float m_fMaxY;
00140 
00141     float m_fZ;
00142 
00143     float *m_afMinS;
00144     float *m_afMaxS;
00145     float *m_afMinT;
00146     float *m_afMaxT;
00147 };
00148 
00149 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 
00151 } // end namespace: Spark
00152 
00153 #endif
